alert.note: Alert for Coast Range of Northwest Oregon; Greater Portland Metro Area; Lower Columbia (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 9:39AM PST until January 19 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of around two tenths of an inch. Up to one third of an inch near the west end of the Columbia River Gorge. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Oregon, Coast Range of Northwest Oregon, Lower Columbia and Greater Portland Metro Area. In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Coast Range of Northwest Oregon; Greater Portland Metro Area; Lower Columbia
